amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing a reduction in Medicaid funding that could lead to rural hospital closures, cost increases for individuals with other kinds of insurance, or higher rates of uncompensated care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1693 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 186.

action.text: Amendment SA 1693 proposed by Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 1717. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing a reduction in Medicaid funding that could lead to rural hospital closures, cost increases for individuals with other kinds of insurance, or higher rates of uncompensated care.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1693 proposed by Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 1717.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1693 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 186.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1693 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 186.
